CORPORATE GOVERNANCE 
AEGON is a public company under Dutch law. It is governed by three corporate bodies: the General	Meeting	of	
Shareholders , which meets at least once every year, the Executive	Board  and the Supervisory	Board . In addition, 
AEGON also has a Management Board, which assists the Executive Board in its tasks and responsibilities. As a 
company established in the Netherlands, AEGON is subject to the Dutch Corporate Governance Code.
